title: Barriers to Communicating Impact
desc: A challenge in the nonprofit/philanthropic sector is the difficulty in providing immediate and tangible insights into how donations are making an impact. AI could be the key to developing tools that offer real-time transparency, ultimately enhancing donor trust and contributions. For instance, can AI assist with common comms or events management tasks, for non-profits who are not able to hire full-time staff in those positions? And, rather than naively generating text with generative AI, can non-profits develop workflows for making more compelling and accurate communications?

custom_fields.short_desc: Can AI be used to provide real-time insights into the impact of donations to improve transparency and build donor trust?
